TextView.android:text: Battery Boost In Progress \nPlease Wait To Start Heater

How to make device discoverable?
 
Option 1.Battery has enough charge
 
Make sure heater is off.Manually switch 
on lights for one minute followed by rapid 
on and off of light for more than three 
times in less in 10 seconds then click 
ok below.
 
Option 2.Battery does not have enough 
charge
 
Open and close the greenhouse door a 
couple of times.Then click ok below.
